actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to limit to 5 percent cost-of-living benefit increase under the old-age, survivors', and disability insurance and supplemental security income programs established by the Social Security Act through June 30, 1976.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Limits to five percent cost-of-living benefit increases under the Old-age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance and supplemental security income programs established by the Social Security Act through June 30, 1976.

titles.title: A bill to limit to 5 percent cost-of-living benefit increase under the old-age, survivors', and disability insurance and supplemental security income programs established by the Social Security Act through June 30, 1976.
